<lb n="c57-0167__main__33"/>aright <del loc="c57-0167__main__d1e29192__Start"/>fear not that you commit<del loc="c57-0167__main__d1e29192__End"/><del loc="c57-0167__main__d1e29195__Start"/>an<del loc="c57-0167__main__d1e29195__End"/><zone loc="c57-0167__main__End"/><surface xml:id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0167__End"/><surface xml:id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0168__Start"/><graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0168.jp2"/><zone loc="c57-0168__main__Start"/><lb n="c57-0168__main__1"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-168.01"/>act of cruelty – No the blood of all the innocent <lb n="c57-0168__main__2"/>that he has murdered will plead for you<anchor xml:id="c57-168.01"/>
